definition: the act of suffocating someone by constricting the windpipe
details:
noun
- the act of suffocating someone by constricting the windpipe
= example: the act of suffocating someone by constricting the windpipe
= synonyms: choking
- (pathology) constriction of a body part so as to cut off the flow of blood or other fluid
= example: (pathology) constriction of a body part so as to cut off the flow of blood or other fluid
- the condition of having respiration stopped by compression of the air passage
